Social Apps and Tools I've Used

  • LinkedIn: For job-related posts and engagements.
  • Github: This is where I deploy my projects and manage version control.
  • Quizlet: Study and Flashcard Creation
  • StackOverflow: This is by far my favourite platform when I'm coding. It's where I go to find answers and solutions. It's like my quick guide to getting things done while coding, and it's always there when I need it.
  • Figma: I rarely use this, but it is useful when you are designing your website or just want to edit and design some stuff.

Online learning Platforms

  • W3Wschools: This site is very helpful when you are a beginner. It provides step-by-step explanations and free code samples to experiment with and make changes to.
  • Udemy: Udemy is another great site. They offer free courses with certificates that you can take advantage of.
  • Codewars: For tech-related posts and engagements, it's like the Facebook version app for tech people.

Flowchart and Diagram Tools

  • Draw.io: Free, open-source online tool for creating flowcharts, network diagrams, and more.
  • Lucidchart: Web-based tool for collaborative flowcharts, mind maps, and UML diagrams.
  • SmartDraw: Diagramming tool with integration options for various platforms.
